resources.string-array:
Dictionary.com
:en:
http://dictionary.com/browse/%2$s -->
TheFreeDictionary.com
:en:es:
http://%1$s.thefreedictionary.com/_/dict.aspx?word=%2$s
Larousse.com
:fr:
http://www.larousse.com/%1$s/dictionaries/french/%2$s
Littre.reverso.net
:fr:
http://littre.reverso.net/dictionnaire-francais/definition/%2$s
DIEC
:ca:
http://mdlc.iec.cat/results.asp?txtEntrada=%2$s
Viccionari
:ca:
http://ca.wiktionary.org/w/index.php?search=%2$s
DISC lookup
:ca:
http://escrable.montane.cat/diccionari/cercador/?mot=%2$s
Google
http://www.google.com/search?nl=%1$s\u0026q=%2$s
resources.string: Copyright (C) 2013 by Oliver\'s Ride. This free/open source software is released under the GNU Public License.
Toolbar icons by Sarah Chu; other credits pending permission.
For a manual or sourcecode see: http://xwords.sf.net/android.php. To report bugs, suggest features, offer to help, etc., please email: xwords@eehouse.org.
The wordlist %s contains only tile information. There are no words to browse.
Android can\'t find a move; pass
\u0020Do you still want to accept this move?
Crosswords on %s wrong version for Bluetooth play.
Bluetooth is not available. This may mean that your device doesn\'t support it, or that it\'s been turned off.
Bluetooth sends to %1$s have failed too many times. Re-open the game to try again.

Create a game that will be played via Bluetooth with devices that are nearby and paired with yours. Both buttons will initiate a game with other devices (one or more) that you choose (from paired devices that already have Crosswords installed.) The first uses defaults; the second lets you change them before beginning the game.
Bluetooth send to %1$s failed; retry %3$d in %2$d seconds.
The group for new games cannot be deleted."
%1$s won\'t work unless you enable Google Play services.
%1$s won\'t run without Google Play services, which are missing from your device.
%1$s is having trouble with Google Play services. Please try again.
%1$s won\'t run without Google Play services, which are not supported by your device.
%1$s won\'t run unless you update Google Play services.
%1$s won\'t run without Google Play services, which are currently updating.
New version of Google Play services needed. It will update itself shortly.
Are you sure you want to delete the checked phone number[s]?
Are you sure you want to delete this game?
Are you sure you want to delete %s?
\u0020One game (at least) is using it, but there is another %s wordlist installed that can replace it.
\u0020It is the only %s wordlist installed. One or more games will be unopenable without it.
Are you sure you want to reset this game? Resetting erases all moves and any connection information.
Are you sure you want to restore all settings to their original values?
Are you sure you want to restore all color settings to their original values?
This game is in play. If you save these changes it must be restarted. Do you want to save these changes?

Warning: This feature is meant for phones with unlimited texting plans. Once you enable it dozens of SMS (text) messages will be sent (invisibly) for each game played. If you don\'t have an unlimited plan your carrier may charge you for each and every message!\n\nShould play via SMS be enabled?
Yes: I\'ll pay all carrier charges
Are you sure you want to undo the last committed turn?
Network status for game connected via %1$s:
This is a standalone game. There is no network status.
Thanks for installing Crosswords! Feel free to enter your name here. It will be used when creating new games. (You can change it later in the \"New game default\" section of Settings.)
You already have a game that seems to have been created (on %1$s) from the same invitation. Are you sure you want to create another?
(If relevant, please include the version: \"%s\"; and make/model of your phone or tablet.)"
Use the button below to create a game. Tap an existing game to play it or long-tap it for other options.
You can hide this and the buttons below in the Appearance section of Settings (accessed via your device\'s menu key.)
Use the menu key to add a game.
Phone list is empty. Use the \"Import contact\" button to add people you want to invite, the + button to enter numbers directly.
Only if you have unlimited texting!
• Agree on a room name with the other player.
• Enter the room name in the first box below. The room names on your two phones must be identical.
• Optionally, enter player names in the second box (one per phone)
• Press the \"Play game\" button on both phones to start the game.
Display score summary after every robot or remote turn
In a multi-device game there must be at least one player from and another not from this device. Please check off-device players.
Are you sure you want to delete this group?
\u0020(It contains %d game[s], which will also be deleted.)
Do not visually indicate which board cell is touched
It\'s useful only when you\'re starting out...
Hiding the game name lets the board be slightly larger
Are you sure you want to resign?
You are using the wordlist %1$s but the game host is using %2$s. Would you like to use %3$s too?
You and the host of this game are using different versions of the wordlist %1$s.
\u0020(You will have to download it first.)
Please select the %d device[s] you want to include in this game. Use the Rescan button if you don\'t see a device you expect.
You have been invited to play Crosswords using the wordlist %2$s (for play in %3$s), but it is not installed. Would you like to download the wordlist?
%1$s has invited you to play Crosswords using the wordlist %2$s (for play in %3$s), but it is not installed. Would you like to download the wordlist or decline the invitation?

\u003ca href=\"%1$s\"\u003ETap here\u003c/a\u003E (or tap the full link below, or, if you already have Crosswords installed, open the attachment) to accept my invitation and join this game.
\u003cbr \\\u003E \u003cbr \\\u003E (full link: %1$s )
This game is missing %1$d remote player[s]. Would you like to invite someone to join -- assuming you haven\'t already?
\u0020(You are expecting multiple remote players. Be sure to address your invitation to that many people.)
Please check the %d phone number[s] you want to invite to your new game, then tap \"Invite checked\".
Let\'s play Crosswords! Join this game: %1$s .
This game has been deleted on another device. You will not be able to play any further.
Another host has already registered a room using that name. Rename yours or retry later.
The relay has lost contact with another device in this game.
No host has registered a room by that name.
All players are here in room \"%s\".
Device %1$d connected to relay in room \"%2$s\". Waiting for %3$d player[s].
You are providing more players than the host expects.
Settings that apply to networked games
Paired device %s has invited you to play
One or more moves has arrived

Create a new game where all players will be on this device. To play against a robot and with your default settings (in %1$s, etc.) just press \"Play now\". To add players or change game settings, press \"Configure first\".

Create a game that will be played over the network. The \"Invite now\" button starts a two-device game and helps you invite a friend to join it. Or press \"Configure first\" to change some of the defaults before you start your networked game. (You\'ll have a chance to send invites later.)
Games that have already connected to the relay cannot be copied. Use \"New from\" for a ready-to-play copy with all the same settings.
A wordlist this game is using has disappeared. (Usually this means it\'s on an external card that is no longer available.)

Unable to open game \"%1$s\" because wordlist %2$s not found. (It may have been deleted, or stored on an external card that is no longer available.) You can download a replacement or substitute another %3$s wordlist.
You need to download a replacement %2$s wordlist before you can open game \"%1$s\". (The original may have been deleted or stored on an external card that is no longer available.)
Unable to download. Do you have a web browser installed?
This game cannot connect without a room name.
No games found that connect via the relay.
Moving is impossible until there is more than one group.
No public rooms found for %1$d-player games in %2$s. Try refreshing or creating your own.

Moving tiles to the board:\nYou can drag tiles between the rack and the board, or you can tap an empty square to place the board arrow. Rack tiles you tap will replace the arrow (moving it one square in the direction it points.) Tap the arrow once to change its orientation; a second time, to hide it. A checkbox in the Appearance section of Settings will hide it permanently.
This button opens the wordlist browser on the current player\'s wordlist.
This button opens the screen for messaging between devices in this game. Messages will be kept until you delete the game that contains them.
You have connected and joined a game on the relay; the room is now full. The device that created the room will now assign your initial tiles and play can begin.
You have connected and started a game in a new room. Once the remaining devices have joined your room and Crosswords has assigned them tiles the game can begin.
You have connected and joined a game on the relay. You will be notified when the remaining device[s] have joined your room and play can begin.
Tapping the \"pts\" counter that appears at the right end of the rack is the easiest way to commit a move.
This button flips the board across a diagonal axis.
This button shows all possible moves in descending order (using tiles to the right of the rack divider.)
This button shows all possible moves in ascending order (using tiles to the right of the rack divider.)
This button randomly rearranges tiles in the rack.
This button lets you look up the words just played online. (Note that not all languages are supported yet.)
Create a new ready-to-play game using all the settings from this one. That is, treat this game as a template.

This action checks the relay for pending moves/messages for all networked games and flags those with pending moves. When you open a flagged game it will connect and sync. (In a later release these moves will be downloaded in the background.)
You are entering tile-exchange mode. Tap tiles to add/remove them from the set to be exchanged. Use the buttons to commit your turn or exit exchange mode.
The player whose turn it is is drawn large in the scoreboard. Hold your finger on a name in the scoreboard to get details about that player\'s most recent move.
This button undos or redoes the current turn.
This game is in play. Some settings, e.g. the number of players, cannot be changed without restarting it. When you leave this page you will have a chance to discard changes to avoid a restart.
This button changes whether the board shows letters on placed tiles or their point values. Use it to remind yourself what a tile is worth.
This button toggles the board between zoomed and regular size. Drag it when it is zoomed to see parts that are hidden.
Give a warning if a word isn\'t in the built-in dictionary
Tapping on scoreboard name shows that player\'s tiles
How to handle \"phonies\" (words not in wordlist)
Edit colors used on the board
Fetching public rooms for %1$d-player games in %2$s.
Are you sure you want to exchange the selected tiles (%s)?
To start a basic networked two-player game in %s:
Change the name of this group to:
Change the name of this game to:
How smart is the robot player?
Scanning for Crosswords on paired devices
For what players should this wordlist be the default for new games? (The language %s will be the default for both.)
Tapped rack tiles land on this arrow when it is visible
Do NOT display score summary after every human turn
Playing via SMS is currently disabled. You can enable it in Settings->Network game settings.

Create a game that will be played via invisible text messages. The \"Invite now\" button starts a two-device game and helps you invite a friend to join it. Or press \"Configure first\" to change some of the defaults before you start your SMS game. (You\'ll have a chance to send invites later.)
Send invitation using SMS (texting) or via email?
Even if they can be taller
The hint feature is disabled for this game. Enable it for a new game using the Settings dialog.
Start on the star. (It\'s a double word score.)
Empty squares cannot separate tiles played.
No peeking at remote players\' tiles!
No peeking at the robot\'s tiles!
You can\'t do that; it\'s not your turn!
Illegal word in move; turn lost!
At least one player must be marked \"Remote\" for a game started as Host.
Refused attempt to register unexpected user[s]
Conflict between Host and Guest wordlists; Host wins.
New pieces must contact others already in place.
All tiles played must be in a line.
Too few tiles left to exchange.
Must play two or more pieces on the first move.
%d tiles left in pool and all tray[s]:\n
Sort racks whenever new tiles are added
The number %1$s for %2$s is not a \"mobile\" number. Import anyway?
Play via SMS is currently disabled, so no moves will be sent for this game. (If you want to enable play via SMS, go to Settings->Network game settings.)
Are you certain this number is on an account with unlimited texting? Click cancel if you are not.
Zoom in when starting a new word
